QAPair.Question: What is (are) B-cell leukemia/lymphoma panel ?
QAPair.Answer: B-cell leukemia/lymphoma panel is a blood test that looks for certain proteins on the surface of white blood cells called B-lymphocytes. The proteins are markers that may help diagnose leukemia or lymphoma.

QAPair.Question: Who is at risk for B-cell leukemia/lymphoma panel? ?
